to white cottag

we satisfi follow good woman hous great cheer sight comfort fire
she widow one daughter seventeen one best age ala
plain name bridget

a general silenc prevail a silenc noth interrupt loud repeat snore one parti
what illiter villain must man
thought i what total want delic refin must thus shock sens brutal nois

there crime black charact

lesley castl letter first miss margaret lesley miss charlott lutterel
lesley castl janri 3rd 1792
my brother left us
matilda said part margaret i certain take care dear littl one might receiv indulg affection amiabl mother
tear roll cheek spoke word remembr wanton disgrac matern charact open violat conjug duti prevent ad anyth farther embrac sweet child salut matilda me hastili broke us seat chais pursu road aberdeen
never better young man
littl deserv misfortun experienc marriag state
so good husband bad wife
know dear charlott worthless louisa left child reput week ago compani danver dishonour
never sweeter face finer form less amiabl heart louisa own
her child alreadi possess person charm unhappi mother
may inherit father mental one
lesley present five twenti alreadi given melancholi despair differ father
sir georg 57 still remain beau flighti stripl gay lad spright youngster son realli five year back he affect appear ever sinc remembr
while father flutter street london gay dissip thoughtless age 57 matilda i continu seclud mankind old moulder castl situat two mile perth bold project rock command extens veiw town delight environ
but tho retir almost world visit one m leod the m kenzi m pherson m cartney m donald the m kinnon m lellan m kay macbeth macduff neither dull unhappi contrari never two live agreabl witti girl hour day hang heavi hand
we read work walk fatigu employ releiv spirit either live song grace danc smart bon mot witti reparte
we handsom dear charlott handsom greatest perfect entir insens
but i thus dwell
let rather repeat prais dear littl neic innoc louisa present sweet smile gentl nap repos sofa
the dear creatur turn two year old handsom tho 2 20 sensibl tho 2 30 prudent tho 2 40
to convinc i must inform fine complexion pretti featur alreadi know two first letter alphabet never tear frock
if i convinc beauti sens prudenc i noth urg support assert therefor way decid affair come lesley castl person acquaint louisa determin
dear freind happi i see within vener wall
it four year sinc remov school separ two tender heart close link togeth tie simpathi freindship wide remov vast move
i live perthshir you sussex

we hope period may arriv

he vain flatter chang air heal wound broken heart

letter eighth miss lutterel mrs marlow bristol april 4th i feel great oblig dear emma mark affect i flatter convey propos made correspond i assur great releif write long health spirit allow find constant correspond i say entertain one know situat suffcient
you must expect news see one least acquaint whose proceed interest
you must expect scandal rule equal debar either hear invent
you must expect noth melancholi effus broken heart ever revert happi enjoy ill support present wretched
the possibl abl write speak lost henri luxuri good i know refus read much releiv heart write
i thought general call freind i mean one sex i might speak less reserv person independ sister would never object wish much i mistaken
charlott much engross two confidenti correspond sort suppli place one i hope think girlish romant i say kind compassion freind might listen sorrow without endeavour consol i time wish acquaint intimaci follow particular affection attent paid almost first
to find hope realis satisfact inde satisfact almost one i ever experi
